If the 'To' field is empty then no e-mails will be sent. In addition to the keyword replacements pointed to at the top of this screen, you may use the following keywords in any of the above fields:
  • %form_info% - a list of form information including the asset id, name and URL of the form, and the name and asset id of the site
  • %form_summary% - a list of responses received from this submission
The address entered in this field will be used to send receipt e-mails. You may select from fields of E-mail Address type only. If this field is empty no receipt e-mails will be sent.

Note that the receipt will always be sent to the address entered in the e-mail field specified above. You can use the 'To' address to specify additional email addresses that the receipt should also be sent to. In addition to the keyword replacements pointed to at the top of this screen, you may use the following keywords in any of the above fields:
  • %form_info% - a list of form information including the asset id, name and URL of the form, and the name and asset id of the site
  • %form_summary% - a list of responses received from this submission

Any text field (preferably a multiple-line one) can be used for this field. It will be expected to contain e-mail addresses, separated by white space (ie. a space or a newline), a comma or a semi-colon. If this field is empty no friend e-mails will be sent.

Note that the receipt will always be sent to the addresses entered in the e-mail field specified above. You can use the 'To' address to specify additional email addresses that the receipt should also be sent to. In addition to the keyword replacements pointed to at the top of this screen, you may use the following keywords in any of the above fields:
  • %form_info% - a list of form information including the asset id, name and URL of the form, and the name and asset id of the site
  • %form_summary% - a list of responses received from this submission
  • %referral_url% - the URL that the user was viewing before comming to this form
